events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit as expected.
The customer's request involves a return and refund for an ill-fitting product, so we classify this case under Refund.
Assigned the refund support specialist team to handle the customerâ€™s return request for the jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket and get a refund. I'm here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so we can process your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket was too small despite checking the size chart, so I'd like to return it.
Thank you for the information. I have issued a return label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, we'll process your refund within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and the return label. I appreciate the smooth process and look forward to the refund.
We consider this case resolved as the return label has been sent and refund process instructions provided to the customer.
Following up to confirm that you have sent the jacket back and to see if the refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the jacket yesterday and I have received my refund today. Thank you for your help!
Closing this support case as the customer has confirmed receipt of refund and is satisfied with the resolution.
